segments.text: The scene feels like a snapshot of chaos hiding behind domestic bliss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the open window, the garden is serene and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would glimpse out there, just to see how peaceful things can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Instead, she’s so focused on polishing that plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how she might react if she suddenly noticed the water pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she would scold the children for their antics or just sigh in resignation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange mix of nostalgia and anxiety watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
